attributes.action: Ban coffee machines and energy drinks being sold in schools.
attributes.additional_details: Caffeine and energy drinks are now being sold to childern from as young as 11 in schools. Caffeine is addictive and causes hyperactivity. How can teachers be expected to teach a classroom full of children who are hyperactive due to caffeine being cosumed on the school premises. It is advised that energy drinks are not suitable for children so why should they be available in schools. We need to make the government ban these from being sold in schools.
